channel.title: Tag: fiction - blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: You Wake Up
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: A creative writing exercise inspired by getting up too many times last night.</body></html>

item.title: The Machine is Grieving
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: Recently, I lost a grandparent and a pet. Such reconfigurations are difficult to process.</body></html>

item.title: Begging for Treats
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: Ever wonder what would happen if a Kardashev Type II civilization found us cute?</body></html>

item.title: Taking the Red Shoes
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: I'm trying to build a daily creative writing habit. This post is the result of an exercise toward that end. It's probably an awful first draft of a little flash fiction scene, unless I've tried something especially weird or decided to write something meta. Let me know what you think!</body></html>
